channel.title: Testscape source help! :s:s
channel.description:
well, i have made a previous server before untill it deleted itself or something :S so i remade 1, i used cheezescape source last time,
but now im using testscape my friend recommended testscape so i used it... its going all well untill i went into client editing the name. E.G Welcome to testscape!. i change it to welcome to my server name i save it reopen run server... and it doesnt change anything i edit in client doesnt change im like wth!
i have retryed many times....
so can some 1 either help me fix this or...
have a link to download cheezescape which im more comfortable with

item.title: Testscape source help! :s:s
item.dc:creator: @wazup wazup
item.description:
@wazup wrote:

u gota save in client den COMPILE u allways do compile after updates or edits … runserver is for just running it

Read full topic
